nodes.text: Grokan was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto slicer living during the Galactic War. A member of a group of genius techno-criminal Niktos known as the Circle, he was imprisoned along with them on Belsavis by the Galactic Republic. Grokan participated in the Project Noble Focus, in which the Republic used a Rakata machine to get a reading out of him. Grokan and the Circle got free during the Invasion of Belsavis around 3641 BBY, when Sith Lord Kallig approached them, seeking the information on the Mother Machine.
Grokan appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Sith Inquisitor class mission on Belsavis.
